#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int  pii[28];
bool cmpstr(string a , string b)
{
	return (a.length()<b.length())||(a.length()==b.length()&&a>b);
}
char s[10000];
string abc[30];
int main()
{
	int n;
	int t,z;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf(" %s",&s);
		n=strlen(s);
		for(int i=0;i<26;++i)
		pii[i]=0,abc[i]="";
		for(int i=0;i<n;++i)
		++pii[ s[i]-'a' ];

		int i=0;
		if(pii[0]!=0)
		abc[0].push_back('a'),++i;

		for(;i<26;++i)
		{
			if(pii[i]!=0)
			{
				abc[i]="";
				for(int j=i-1;j>=0;--j)
				{
					if(pii[j]!=0)
					{
					string mys=abc[j];
					mys.push_back(i+'a');
					if(pii[i]>=pii[j]&&cmpstr(abc[i],mys) )
					abc[i]=mys;
					}
				}
				if(abc[i].length()==0)
				abc[i].push_back(i+'a');
			}
		}
		string ans="";
		for(int i=0;i<26;++i)
		{
			if(abc[i].length()!=0&&cmpstr(ans,abc[i]) )
			ans=abc[i];
			//printf("%c ",i+'a');
			//cout<<abc[i]<<"\n";
		}
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
	
	}
	return 0;
}
